title: Lost & Found: Finding the Office (Usefulness 9)
description: Traveler usefulness 9/10 phrases for the Finding the Office subcategory within Lost & Found. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Where is the lost and found counter?
cards.romaji: Wasuremono toriatsukaijo wa doko desu ka?
cards.japanese: 忘れ物取扱所はどこですか？
